definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

sentences.english: The campus boasts elegant environment with green plants and fragrant flowers, which is excellent for learning and living.
sentences.chinese: 校園環境幽雅，綠樹成蔭，鳥語花香，宜學宜居。

sentences.english: It's about quality of life, about making spaces livable and civilized.
sentences.chinese: 這是關於空間的宜居和文明的生活質量。

sentences.english: But what makes it an attractive place to have a lot to do with its slower pace of life. .
sentences.chinese: 不爲宜居之地似乎與它較慢的生活節奏大有關係。

sentences.english: Will adhere to people-centered, create a desirable living environment in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 將堅持以人爲本，創建上海宜居環境。

sentences.english: Yanqing, with livable ecology and charming sceneries, welcomes your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 延慶，生態宜居，景色迷人，隨時歡迎您的到來。

sentences.english: The region is too wild to be inhabited.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區太荒涼了，不宜居住。

sentences.english: Longwan District should actively foster livable should venture investment and business environment for development.
sentences.chinese: 龍灣區積極培育宜居宜商宜創業的投資和發展環境。

sentences.english: The quality of life and livability of these areas is really heartbreaking.
sentences.chinese: 這些地方的生活質量和宜居性確實令人心碎。

sentences.english: The newly-discovered planet g, however, lies right in the middle of the habitable zone.
sentences.chinese: 然而，新發現的行星g恰好位於宜居帶正中區域。

sentences.english: Vancouver Canada is one of the most livable cities in the world.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大溫哥華是世界上最宜居的城市之一。

sentences.english: “This makes New York more livable,” Salam says.
sentences.chinese: “它會使紐約更加宜居，”薩拉姆說。

sentences.english: Shantou is an agreeable city suitable for both commerce and dwelling.
sentences.chinese: 汕頭是一座宜商宜居的城市。

sentences.english: The environment suitable for living of South Hunan traditional residence has embodies deeply traditional Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 湘南傳統人居的宜居環境深深地滲透着中國傳統文化。

sentences.english: On one hand, plan and construction of cities and areas are concentrated on livable living standard.
sentences.chinese: 各城市和地區都以宜居標準對本地進行規劃和建設。

sentences.english: The marker of liveability for a city is its human scale.
sentences.chinese: 城市宜居的標準，最主要的就是人的尺度。

sentences.english: Livability is the basic prerequisite of a city's existence and development.
sentences.chinese: 宜居，是城市最基本的存在和發展的前提。

definition: Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
the finest place in the nation (often used in reference to the capital city)/also written 首善之地[shou3 shan4 zhi1 di4]
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
mountains on one side and water on the other
location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
